name: Henry Muccini
content: My Home - Henry MucciniHenry Muccini | Personal website Henry Muccini Full Professor in Computer Science, University of L'Aquila, Italy My Home AboutMe My Research My CV Publications Contact Copyright text here My Home: A snapshot A software architect and engineer, Henry Muccini is Full Professor in Computer Science at the Information Engineering and Computer Science and Mathematics (DISIM) Department, University of L’Aquila, Italy. I got my PhD degree in Computer Science from the University of Rome, La Sapienza and spent my PostDoc  at the University of California Irvine (USA). I am leading the FrAmeLab research team on software architecture, software engineering of ML-enabled systems, Green AI, and data architectures. I am leading the BeT PRIN 2022 project, locally coordinating the EDISS and SE4GD Erasmus Mundus programs, the CINI Smart Cities and Communities distributed laboratory, as well as the double degree international study programmes in software engineering and computer science (GSEEM, I2COST). I have been leading the Uffizi Galleries – UnivAQ project.
